trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> class requests an extended form of the distinguished name of an Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> richiede una forma estesa del nome distinto di un oggetto Servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" />.

trans-unit.source: A value of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> enumeration that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Un valore dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> che specifica il formato del nome distinto esteso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> class using the specified flag.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl" /> utilizzando il flag specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.Flag" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: La propriet√† <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.Flag" /> contiene uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> che specifica il formato del nome distinto esteso.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag" /> che specifica il formato del nome distinto esteso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.GetValue" /> method returns the format of the extended distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.GetValue" /> restituisce il formato del nome distinto esteso.

trans-unit.source: The format of the extended distinguished name.
